page.title: 07Employment in Herm
page.content: For thirty-six years the island has been run and administered by one family, the Woods. All employment in Herm is involved in the running of the island and its upkeep, tourism or farming. Although small, the population covers the whole range of employment and essential services. The resident population of about forty is supplemented in the summer months by about sixty extra staff who take care of the 100,000 people who visit the island every year.There is usually no problem obtaining staff either permanent or seasonal, and many seasonal workers return year after year.
